description: Theory-forge extensibility registry. Commands check this file to discover available data sources, methodologies, and custom agents. Use /author-data-source and /author-methodology to add entries.

data_sources.name: CSV / Excel
data_sources.notes: Native support — no importer needed. Handled directly by /explore-data and analysis commands.

data_sources.name: Plain Text Transcripts
data_sources.format: Text files (.txt, .md) containing interview transcripts or field notes
data_sources.notes: Native support — no importer needed. Place in data/qual/interviews/ or data/qual/fieldnotes/.

data_sources.name: BibTeX References
data_sources.format: BibTeX files (.bib) from Zotero, Mendeley, or manual export
data_sources.notes: Import via /import-refs. Stores parsed references in state.json for citation tracking.

methodologies.name: Theory Violation (Zuckerman)
methodologies.description: Paper shows established theory makes a prediction that is WRONG under certain conditions. The dominant frame for top management/org journals.

methodologies.name: Theory Elaboration (Fisher & Aguinis)
methodologies.description: Paper adds PRECISION to existing theory — clarifies mechanisms, specifies moderators, unpacks processes without contradicting core predictions.
methodologies.notes: Currently evaluated inline by /eval-contribution. Candidate for standalone rubric JSON + eval command.

methodologies.name: Phenomenon Description (Weick)
methodologies.description: The phenomenon itself IS the contribution. Theory is sensitizing, not predictive. Rich description enables future theorizing.
methodologies.notes: Currently evaluated inline by /eval-contribution. Candidate for standalone rubric JSON + eval command.

methodologies.name: Methodological Contribution (Abbott)
methodologies.description: Paper develops or demonstrates a new way of studying something. Method IS the contribution; substantive findings may be secondary.
methodologies.notes: Currently evaluated inline by /eval-contribution. Candidate for standalone rubric JSON + eval command.

methodologies.name: Practical Insight (Corley & Gioia)
methodologies.description: Primary value is applied. Clear prescriptive implications, accessible to non-academics.
methodologies.notes: Currently evaluated inline by /eval-contribution. Candidate for standalone rubric JSON + eval command.

methodologies.name: Literature Integration (Palmatier et al.)
methodologies.description: Paper organizes, synthesizes, or reconciles existing work. No new data — value is in conceptual organization.
methodologies.notes: Currently evaluated inline by /eval-contribution. Candidate for standalone rubric JSON + eval command.

methodologies.name: General Paper Quality
methodologies.description: General paper quality rubric covering structure, argumentation, evidence, and writing. Not contribution-type specific.

methodologies.name: Claim Verification
methodologies.description: Checks that claims are honestly matched to evidence. Used by /audit-claims and /verify-claims.

methodologies.name: Qualitative Inductive Research Criteria
methodologies.description: Evaluation criteria specific to inductive qualitative papers — data access, analytical transparency, theoretical contribution.
